<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>FlowiseAI API Demo</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" />
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
   
    <script type="module">
      import Chatbot from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/flowise-embed/dist/web.js"
      Chatbot.init({
          chatflowid: "52f031fe-bdbb-4c09-9e97-8f3fd3244951",
          apiHost: "http://localhost:3000",
          theme: {
            button: {
                backgroundColor: "red",
            },
            chatWindow: {
              userMessage: {
                    backgroundColor: "red",
              },
            textInput: {
                    
                    sendButtonColor: "red",
                },
              }
        }
      })
  </script>
  
  
  
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 max-w-4xl">
      <header class="flex justify-between py-6">
        <div class="text-2xl font-bold">NALCO</div>
        <nav>
          <ul class="flex gap-4 items-center text-sm">
            <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
            <li><a href="#">Business</a></li>
            <li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
            <li>
              <button
                class="border py-2 px-4 rounded-xl bg-red-600 text-white self-start hover:opacity-80 text-xs uppercase"
                href="#"
              >
                Menu
              </button>
            </li>
          </ul>
        </nav>
      </header>

      <!-- Hero Section -->
      <section class="py-6 grid grid-cols-2 items-center gap-2">
        <div class="flex flex-col gap-2">
          <h1 class="text-6xl uppercase font-extrabold text-black-600">
            National Aluminium
            <span class="text-red-600">Company Limited</span> 
          </h1>
         
        </div>
        <div>
          <div class="overflow-hidden rounded-br-2xl rounded-tl-2xl">
            <img src="/public/hero.jpg" alt="" />
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      <!-- Featured -->
      <section class="py-6">
        <h3 class="pb-4 text-2xl">About Us</h3>

        <!-- list of products -->
        <ul class="grid grid-cols-2 items-center gap-2">
          <li
            class="p-4 bg-neutral-100 rounded-xl hover:opacity-90 flex flex-col gap-2"
          >
            <div class="h-32 overflow-hidden rounded-xl">
              <img
                class="w-full h-full object-cover"
                src="data:image/png;base64,"
              />
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-lg font-semibold">Corporate Profile</h4>
            
            <p class="text-xs">
              National Aluminium Company Limited (NALCO) is a Schedule ‘A’ Navratna CPSE established on 7th January, 1981 having its registered office at Bhubaneswar.  It is one of the largest integrated Bauxite-Alumina-Aluminium- Power Complex in the Country. At present, Government of India holds 51.28% of paid up equity capital. The Company has been operating its captive Panchpatmali Bauxite Mines for the pit head Alumina refinery at Damanjodi, in the District of Koraput in Odisha and Aluminium Smelter & Captive Power Plant at Angul.  As a part of green initiative, NALCO has installed 198 MW Wind Power Plants at various locations in India and 800 kWp roof top Solar Power Plants at its premises to join hands for carbon neutrality. From the days of first commercial operation since 1987 the Company has continuously earned profits for last 36 years. NALCO is one of the leading foreign exchange earning CPSEs of the Country.
            </p>
           
          </li>

          <li
            class="p-4 bg-neutral-100 rounded-xl hover:opacity-90 flex flex-col gap-2"
          >
            <div class="h-32 overflow-hidden rounded-xl">
              <img
                class="w-full h-full object-cover"
                src="https://d2ah634u9nypif.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/alumina-img-1-768x365.jpg"
              />
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-lg font-semibold">Our Operations</h4>
            
            <p class="text-xs">
              As one of the largest integrated primary producer of aluminium in Asia, NALCO’s presence encompasses the entire value chain from bauxite mining, alumina refining, aluminium smelting, power generation to downstream products.
              The Alumina Refinery is located at Damanjodi, Odisha, approximately 14 KM from the bauxite mine at Panchpatmali. The mined-out bauxite is transported from captive mine to refinery by a 14.6 KM long single-light multi-curve 1800 tonnes per hour (TPH) capacity cable belt conveyor. The alumina produced is transported to aluminium smelter at Angul (Odisha) and to Vizag (Andhra Pradesh) port by rail.

The present capacity of Alumina Refinery is 22.75 lakh TPA. Alumina produced is used to meet Company’s requirements for production of primary aluminium at smelter. The surplus alumina is sold to third parties in the export markets.  
            </p>
            
          </li>

          <li
            class="p-4 bg-neutral-100 rounded-xl hover:opacity-90 flex flex-col gap-2"
          >
            <div class="h-32 overflow-hidden rounded-xl">
              <img
                class="w-full h-full object-cover"
                src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"
              />
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-lg font-semibold">Sustainability</h4>
            
            <p class="text-xs">
              At Nalco, “Let all be happy” is the guiding spirit, which is embedded in the company's CSR logo. While trying to suffuse happiness, the company remembers the words of Mahatma Gandhi: "Whenever you are in doubt ... recall the face of the poorest and the weakest man whom you may have seen and ask yourself if the step you contemplate is going to be of any use to him? Will he gain anything by it? Will it restore him to control over his own life and destiny? That test alone can make our plans and programmes meaningful."

Along with its business, Nalco lays special emphasis on its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) activities.
            </p>
            
          </li>

          <li
            class="p-4 bg-neutral-100 rounded-xl hover:opacity-90 flex flex-col gap-2"
          >
            <div class="h-32 overflow-hidden rounded-xl">
              <img
                class="w-full h-full object-cover"
                src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"
              />
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-lg font-semibold">Tenders</h4>
          
            <p class="text-xs">
               Procurement
Products, Services & Works
We use the e-tender/e-commerce platforms which are transparent, non-discriminatory, allowing free access to tenders, allows secure bid submission, available 24×7, and enable us to discover the fair price of our procurement needs. Our sourcing requirements can be found in the Government eMarketplace (GeM) and Central Public Procurement Portal (CPP Portal). All bidders must be registered in these portals to be able to receive notifications and participate in our tenders.   
             </p>
           
          </li>
        </ul>
      </section>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>
